about_the_game:
Enter the Exit Doors escape room company to play a series of escape rooms. Your goal is to find the exit door from each "escape room", although the rooms may have large open areas and different buildings. But there seems to be something a miss in the game. Instructions you are given seem not to match the actual room. Is there something even more wrong in this these rooms?

Classic Point & Click Interaction

Exit Doors is a traditional point & click adventure, with cunning conundrums and puzzles for you to solve. You search for clues and items and talk with game characters. You can interact some objects during game play and also in inventory sometimes, and sometimes also with another object. Hotspots are easy to find, since you can see them all with a single button press. Objects and characters may have variating interaction options depending on the game state. There is a objective and tip system in the game for help.

Talking with game characters can give you hints and options.

Fast navigation system - not a walking simulation

Objectives and tips for help


Localizations up and coming

There will be a localization of the subtitles for German, French and Spanish. Other languages may follow.

short_description: You play a classical point and click adventure where you enter an escape room company called 'Exit doors' and navigate through various escape rooms. But in the company's game, not everything seems to be working. You also need to find a missing stapler to get a date with the girl in reception.
